normalised: **E V Charging Gets a Desi Boost!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, the EV revolution is heating up faster than a Hyderabadi biryani on high flame! And the biggest hurdle, charging, is finally seeing some cool solutions.
normalised: Hey folks, the E V revolution is heating up faster than a Hyderabadi biryani on high flame! And the biggest hurdle, charging, is finally seeing some cool solutions.

unnormalised: IIT Madras just announced a breakthrough in fast charging tech. Apparently, they've cracked the code to juice up your EVs much quicker. Think less waiting time at the charging station and more time cruising around Chennai.
normalised: I I T Madras just announced a breakthrough in fast charging tech. Apparently, they've cracked the code to juice up your E Vs much quicker. Think less waiting time at the charging station and more time cruising around Chennai.

unnormalised: And speaking of stations, Tata Power is planning a massive expansion, especially along the Mumbai-Pune expressway. They are promising a charging point every 50 km or so.
normalised: And speaking of stations, Tata Power is planning a massive expansion, especially along the Mumbai slash Pune expressway. They are promising a charging point every fifty kilometer or so.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Ather Energy is celebrating Onam with discounts on their charging subscriptions. Apparently, gifting EV charging is the new festive trend!
normalised: Meanwhile, Ather Energy is celebrating Onam with discounts on their charging subscriptions. Apparently, gifting E V charging is the new festive trend!

unnormalised: Plus, Reliance is rumored to be investing big Rs. in hyperlocal charging solutions. This would mean smaller, more accessible charging points in residential areas. No more range anxiety during your Sunday drives to see the family! The future looks electric, indeed!
normalised: Plus, Reliance is rumored to be investing big rupees in hyperlocal charging solutions. This would mean smaller, more accessible charging points in residential areas. No more range anxiety during your Sunday drives to see the family! The future looks electric, indeed!
